reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, comfortable, and great for formal events, with great quality for the price. The dress is flattering for curves, with one customer noting how the ruching hides the stomach area, and they appreciate its nice color. While the fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it runs big in the bust area and others noting it's a bit long, customers generally consider it worth the price. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Off-Shoulder Sequin Evening Gown
items.body: I purchased this dress in a size XL. This off-shoulder sequin gown was the perfect choice for the occasionâ€”elegant, comfortable, and eye-catching. The rose gold shimmer added just the right amount of glam, and the design beautifully complemented my shape. The fit was great overall, though it was a tad loose in the chest area. However, that didnâ€™t take away from how confident and classy I felt wearing it. The puff sleeves and draped front detail added a touch of modern sophistication, while the floor-length cut gave it a graceful, flowing look. If youâ€™re looking for a statement piece thatâ€™s both flattering and comfortable, this dress is definitely worth it! Read more
items.author: SWill

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quite a lovely dress
items.body: I got roped into going to the Emmy Awards and needed a dress. I am not a dress person, so there was no way I was going shopping in regular stores. Enter Amazon. I waited until the week before to buy the dress (again, not a dress person!) and didnâ€™t have high hopes, being short (5â€™3) and apple-shaped. Honestly, though, it looked great! And people arenâ€™t lying about the compliments youâ€™ll receive. I even had someone yell from across the street that my dress was gorgeous! Now, the nitty-gritty: it was way too long for me, but 3-inch platforms made it manageable but still a bit too long. I normally wear a 2X/20W but ordered a 3X, and it fit perfectly. Besides dresses, I also have no time for strapless bras, so I just let my bra straps slide down, and it was fine. Iâ€™m not super busty (42C) and that was fine as well. Iâ€™m adding the only two photos I have of the dress in full length, and one is from a little spinning video they took, so the quality isnâ€™t great. I definitely recommend it, though. Itâ€™s comfortable, flattering, and looks a heck of a lot more expensive than it is. Read more
items.author: JustMe

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit long, but beautiful and comfortable
items.body: Beautiful dress. Fit well. It was a bit long though. I'm 5' 4". Lots of compliments:) Read more
items.author: Sandy Rivera

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: Beautiful dress and worth the money. It was a bit large in the chest area which I had altered. The rest of the dress fit perfectly. I'm so happy with my purchase and glad I bought it. I received so many compliments. Read more
items.author: Cindy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE IT!!
items.body: This dress did NOT disappoint!!! It was PERFECT for my holiday performance. It's good quality and fit nicely. I'm 5'2 so needed a small hem, but I'm fully satified. Read more
items.author: MBarber

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a good buy
items.body: I bought this dress and when it arrived it smell full of perfum as if it was worn already and at the bottom of the dress it had confetti and it was shredding already.it was not a good buy i wish i could have send it back. I will cost me more to have it ship back. See picture as proof attached. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but cut small at top.
items.body: I ordered a 2x weight 235 5'4. This dress is well made and very complimentary. However, the top is cut small. Retured for larger size . Read more
items.author: Pleased

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandma- not looking like oneðŸ˜Š
items.body: Beautiful, well made, comfortable - got so many compliments. Perfect black tie event. The cost was perfect. Size fit was perfect! Dress was elegant and moved so pretty. I do wedding gown alterations for a living- this dress was impressive. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Off Shoulder Evening Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Off Shoulder Evening Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Gold, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
